Meʼen (nakwa Mekan, Mieʼen, Mieken, Meqan, Men) bụ asụsụ Nilo-Saharan (Eastern Sudanic, Surmic, Southeast Surmic) nke ndị Meʼen na-asụ na Etiopia
N’afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, e ji mkpụrụ akwụkwọ Geʽez dee ya, ma n’afọ 2007, e mere mkpebi iji mkpụrụ akwụkwọ Latịn mee ihe
Olumba gụnyere Bodi (Podi) na Tishena (Teshina, Teshenna).
Meʼen na Kwegu pụrụ iche n'asụsụ Surmic n'ihi na ha nwere consonants na-apụ apụ.
Hans-Georg Will ewepụtala nkọwa ntụkwasị obi nke akụkụ ụfọdụ nke asụsụ ahụ, na-emegidekarị ọrụ Carlo Conti Rossini, ndetu ndetu asụsụ sara mbara nke onye na-abụghị onye na-asụ asụsụ.
